description: ORICO 2588US Tool Free USB2.0 2.5 " SATA External Hard Drive Enclosure with Unique Tool Free Design allow to make your Internal 7mm to 9.5mm Slim 2.5 inch Laptop SATA Hard Disk Drive or Solid State Drive External Easily and Quickly.Allow to mount or unmount 2.5 - inch Drive without tools & screws in Three Second.Allow Multi Drives sharing the Enclosure and accessed from your computer by take one Drive out and put another one in.ORICO 2588US offer an Easy and Reliable Connectivity up to 480MBps and compatible with USB1.1 & USB1.0.Plug and Play Compatible,All you need is put you Drive in and plug it to your Computer,No Reboot and Additional Driver is needed.Allow to enjoy a Lightning Speed Accessing for your Video,Photo,Music and files regardless at Home,Office or Studio with any Desktop or Laptop via USB Host.ORICO 2588US is a Super Compact and Slim Enclosure easy to slip into your bag or pocket for Carrying & Travelling.If you are looking for something to make your Internal Drive to External,ORICO 2588US will be the Key Solution for you.Compatibility•Compatible with Windows 98 , 2000 , XP , 2003 , Vista , 7 , 2008 , Windows 8 32 or 64Bit , Linux kernels 3.0 or Later and Mac Desktop & Laptop with Available USB Host•Compatible with any 7mm to 9.5mm Slim 2.5 inch SATA HDD or SSD up to 1TBWhat's in the Box1x ORICO 2588US Tool Free USB2.0 Enclosure1x 2 Ft. USB2.0 Cable1x User's Manual1x Warranty Card
title: ORICO 2588US-BK Portable Tool Free 2.5 inch SATA to USB 2.0 Hard Drive External Enclosure
